org.michailov.async

Class AsyncOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.michailov.async.AsyncOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CharsetAsyncOptions

    public class AsyncOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Common options that control the execution of async methods from this package.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static AsyncOptions DEFAULT
      Shared instance that represents the "default" set of options.
      long timeout
      Number of time units before which a given async call should complete.
      static long TIMEOUT_INFINITE
      Sentinel that represents an infinite number of time units.
      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit
      Unit type of the timeout.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AsyncOptions() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        public static final AsyncOptions DEFAULT
        Shared instance that represents the "default" set of options. Use this field to avoid unnecessary heap allocations.

      • TIMEOUT_INFINITE

        public static final long TIMEOUT_INFINITE
        Sentinel that represents an infinite number of time units.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • timeout

        public long timeout
        Number of time units before which a given async call should complete. Once this time is up, the future returned from the given async call will be completed exceptionally. Default is TIMEOUT_INFINITE.

      • timeUnit

        public java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit
        Unit type of the timeout. Default is TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsyncOptions

        public AsyncOptions()
